net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Interface ByteStringAppender<B extends ByteStringAppender<B>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Appendable, StreamingDataOutput<B>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<Underlying>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, MappedBytes, NativeBytes, UncheckedBytes, UncheckedNativeBytes, VanillaBytes

    public interface ByteStringAppender<B extends ByteStringAppender<B>>
extends StreamingDataOutput<B>, Appendable

      • address

        long address(long offset)
      throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtain the underlying address. This is for expert users only.
        Parameters:
        offset - within this buffer. address(start()) is the actual address of the first byte.
        Returns:
        the underlying address of the buffer
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying buffer is on the heap
